Class AccountsGUIFieldValidator

java.lang.Object
  AccountsGUIFieldValidator

public class AccountsGUIFieldValidator
extends java.lang.Object

Associated with the AccountsGUIListener class, this class is used to validate that the data input by the user into the text fields is valid enough to be stored in the database file and assists in preventing human input error

Author:
Jamie Brindle (06352322)
